content:
Here's a shopping list for the Cranberry Orange Granola Bar recipe:

**Pantry:**

* Rolled oats
* Nut butter (e.g., peanut butter, almond butter, or cashew butter)
* Honey
* Chia seeds
* Vanilla extract
* Salt

**Dried Fruits:**

* Dried cranberries (1/2 cup)

**Nuts:**

* Chopped nuts (e.g., almonds, walnuts, or pecans) (1 cup)

**Spices:**

* Orange zest (1 tablespoon)
* Cinnamon (optional)

**Miscellaneous:**

* Parchment paper
* Baking dish (8x8 inch)

**Optional:**

* Orange extract (if you want a stronger orange flavor)

You may already have some of the pantry staples, such as oats, nut butter, honey, and spices, in your kitchen. Be sure to check before you head out to shop!

If you want to make any substitutions or adjustments to the recipe, feel free to do so. Just keep in mind that it may affect the texture and flavor of the granola bars.

Happy shopping and baking!
